Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix Suns have a 6-1 record and are second in the Western Conference; Miami Heat are 3-3 and third in the Eastern Conference.
Phoenix Suns and Miami Heat face off in a non-conference matchup on November 7, 2024.

Miami Heat have injuries: Kevin Love is day-to-day for reconditioning, and Jaime Jaquez Jr. is day-to-day due to illness.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game has a betting line of Suns -5.5 and an over/under of 222.5.
